item.title: The Charlotte Stabbing Didn’t Fit The Media’s Preferred Narrative, So They Buried It
item.description: The Post and others had been slow to cover the Charlotte passenger train murder of Ukraine refugee Iryna Zarutska until late Monday. Why?
